sources.title: Big Boys Don't Cry | Full Movie | Crime Drama | Gripping True Story of Paul Conolly
sources.description:
Based on true events. When police investigate his boyhood friendâ€™s death, Paul Conolly (Michael Socha) is forced to recall his harrowing time growing up in a children's home. Having pulled his wayward life together, Paul vows to confront those responsible for his shattered childhood and seek justice for his friend.
2020. Stars: Michael Socha, Libby Rodliffe, Daniel Adegboyega, Victoria Alcock, Rutter Mark Alec

metadata.Plot: Connolly recalls childhood in children's home after police probe friend's suicide. He struggles to connect with Anthea while confronting those behind his troubled past and friend's death. Inspired by real events.
metadata.Writer: Kal Bonner, Paul Connolly, Steve Crowhurst
metadata.Actors: Daniel Adegboyega, Victoria Alcock, Karanja Augostos
